channel.description: Disclaimer I am not a lawyer Licenses are legal documents Seek advice if needed Free vs. Free Without Cost (Free as in Food) Without Restriction (Free as in Speech) Free != Free Copyright No license implies all rights reserved! Public Domain Least Restrictive Useable by Anyone Can Use for Any Purpose Allows Reselling & Relicensing Creative Commons CC0 GitHub Unlicense Permissive License Few Restrictions Maintain License No Warranty or Liability Allows Reselling & Relicensing MIT, BSD, Apache Licenses Copyleft Licenses More Restrictive All Derivatives Free & Open Cannot Resell or Relicense Can Use Without Restriction?
